definition: to block sb's path/to obstruct/to flag down (a taxi)

sentences.english: Sometimes stress and anxiety can get in the way of creativity.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，壓力和焦慮會成爲創造力的攔路虎。

sentences.english: Liupanshan, stumbling block, the high cost.

sentences.chinese: 不要讓失敗成爲你的攔路虎。

definition: to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: (of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
stepping stone/fig. person used to advance one's career
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
the road back to where one came from
lit. to cross five passes and slay six generals (idiom)/fig. to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success)
pinyin: guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4

definition: lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded
